author: philip
msg: Followup to r9120 which was missing some whitespace and so wasn't
really testing what it was intended to test.  Reformat to try to
make sure this doesn't happen again.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/externals_tests.py
(disallow_dot_or_dotdot_directory_reference): Add missing spaces.

author: philip
msg: Check that svn:external paths refer to items within the svn:external
directory.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/props.c
(svn_wc_parse_externals_description): Canonicalize and internalize
before doing dot/dot-dot checking, check for ".." and absolute path.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/externals_tests.py
(disallow_dot_or_dotdot_directory_reference): Add more test cases.

author: breser
msg: Fix bug with patterns containing spaces.
* contrib/client-side/wcgrep
$pattern should be quoted, we don't want it to expand to multiple paramters
like the other args.

author: striker
msg: * STATUS
Propose r9077 for backport.

author: breser
msg: Make wcgrep a little easier to tweak to an individuals liking and some
other minor modifications of the script.
* contrib/client-side/wcgrep
Document the required utilities of the script.
Default to passing -HnI to the grep utility.
Add environment variables to modify the command called for grep, the
arguments to grep, and the regex used to ignore files.
Remove some trailing whitespace.
